name: Dream Of a Square
description:
One day, the two squares, who had a dream while sleeping, tried to wake up from their dreams, but couldn't wake up in the end.
All the two squares could do in that dream was to open the door by pressing a button appropriate for their color and climb up an unknown place.
Even if I climbed all of it, I didn't know if I could wake up from my dream, but I had to, so I decided to go up there.
Take advantage of your skills and go all the way up to the end

You control two squares that each have different abilities at the same time.
Red squares can push blue squares away.


Blue squares have more jumping power than red squares and can stop in the air.


Press the button that matches your color to open the door and go up to the final stage.

'Dream of a Square' was inspired by the Korean song 'Dream of Square'.
